NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Petitioner, v. ARKANSAS RICE GROWERS COOPERATIVE ASS’N. No. 14973. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Dec. 9, 1953. David P. Findling, Assoc. Gen. Counsel, and A. Norman Somers, Asst. Gen. Counsel, National Labor Relations Board, Washington, D. C., for petitioner. John L. Daggett, Marianna, Ark., for respondent.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
